meanings.definition: To shout or call out loudly to someone
meanings.sent1: He hallooed to his friend across the field.
meanings.sent2: The hunter hallooed to his dog to come back.
meanings.sent3: The children hallooed to each other in excitement.
meanings.sent4: The coach hallooed instructions to the players on the field.
meanings.sent5: The hiker hallooed for help when he got lost in the woods.

meanings.definition: To greet or attract attention by shouting or calling out
meanings.sent1: She hallooed to her neighbor as she passed by.
meanings.sent2: The street performer hallooed to the crowd to gather around.
meanings.sent3: The cat hallooed at the birds outside the window.
meanings.sent4: The auctioneer hallooed out the starting bid for the painting.
meanings.sent5: The lifeguard hallooed warnings to the swimmers about the strong currents.
